short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides whole discussion thread when resolving

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Collapse GitHub discussion threads. Collapsed threads take up less room and do not require you to hide each individual comment.

v1.4 Notes - 6/26/2023

Bugs:
- Fixed the resolve button not working

Enhancements:
- Improved overall resolve button setup

v1.3 Notes

Bugs:
- Fixed page requiring refresh to activate extension
- Fixed original comment preview 

Enhancements:
- Added user icons to collapsed threads
